quote: If you're not an expert in what you're doing, how can you properly serve the client?
why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to focus on their strengths and partner with others for areas outside their expertise.
suggested_hook: Are you truly serving your clients the best way possible?

quote: AI is going to have a massive impact both on commercial and residential real estate.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the growing influence of AI in real estate and encourages agents to adapt.
suggested_hook: Is AI the future of real estate?
